intents.name: addRectangle
utterances: add rectangle with position $left and $top width $width and  height $height
add a $type rectangle with position $left and $top

intents.name: moveRectangle

parameters.name: number
queries: what rectangle number you want to move ?

parameters.name: left
queries: what is the new left position ?

parameters.name: top
queries: what is the new top position ?

utterances: move rectangle $number to position $left and $top width $width and  height $height
